text: Coco Austin and her daughter Chanel Nicole spent the third day of their Bahamas vacation chilling poolside at the SLS Baha Mar in Nassau on Monday. The Cocolicious designer - turning 39 next week - just loves twinning with her two - year - old mini - me as they posed in their Sugar Dollz'Monster Mermaid'bikinis. The mommy & me swimsuits and matching headscarves featured the same green - and - purple color scheme as Disney princess Ariel.
